评论概述: Fits well and it’s well made
评论详情: I love everything about it

Screenshot Clothing offers surprisingly fresh, casual, and comfortable styles with excellent sizing. As a petite guy (waist 28-29, H: 5’5”), I find their small size truly fits like a small—unlike the inflated sizing often seen in American brands today.  In a market where XS has virtually disappeared, and ‘small’ now resembles a medium, Screenshot stands out by providing accurate, well-proportioned sizes that fit comfortably without the baggy, oversized feel of today’s typical Small. Beyond their unique, funky style, this brand ensures clothing feels right and fits perfectly. A HUGE fan, I only desire that I could afford more of them.

评论概述: One of my favorite hoodies now
评论详情: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Screenshot Brand 100% Cotton Hoodie with Color Striped Design, and I must say, it's a standout addition to my wardrobe. Here's a detailed review of my experience:  Fabric and Comfort: The hoodie is made of 100% cotton, which adds a level of comfort and softness to the garment. The fabric feels cozy against the skin, making it perfect for cooler weather or casual lounging. It provides a comfortable fit without feeling too heavy or restrictive. The hoodie is suitable for everyday wear, offering a combination of style and comfort.  Design and Color Striping: One of the standout features of this hoodie is the unique color striping design on the sides and inner arms. The stripes add a vibrant and eye-catching element to the overall design, making the hoodie visually appealing. The color choices are well-coordinated, complementing each other and creating a stylish contrast. The design is modern and trendy, adding a touch of personality to the hoodie.  Quality and Durability: The Screenshot Brand Hoodie exhibits good quality and durability. The stitching is well-done, ensuring the longevity of the garment. The fabric feels sturdy and shows no signs of fraying or wear even after multiple wears and washes. The hoodie has maintained its shape and color, indicating good craftsmanship and attention to detail.  Fit and Sizing: The hoodie offers a comfortable and true-to-size fit. It's recommended to consult the size chart provided by the brand to ensure the best fit. The hoodie provides a relaxed yet flattering silhouette, making it suitable for different body types. The length of the hoodie and the sleeves is appropriate, ensuring a comfortable and stylish look.  Complimentary Design: The complimentary design of this hoodie is another positive aspect. The color striping on the sides and inner arms adds a unique touch that sets it apart from generic hoodies. The design element is well-thought-out and adds a level of sophistication to the garment. It's a hoodie that stands out from the crowd and has received compliments for its stylish and distinct appearance.
